name: Radio Active
description:
Tune the radio to find the clues on the radio stations, to get the phone number and complete the game.

Instructions: Scroll Wheel to change frequency. Keyboard to input numbers above the phone. Click to do a variety of other things(power button, volume buttons).

This game was made for Global game jam 2018, following the theme of 'Transmissions'.

Made by: Sam Hall, Rob Raynor, Millie Fisher, and Andy Findlay
